last_episode_to_air.name: The Ruins
last_episode_to_air.overview: Karppi and Nurmi track the suspect to the ruins of an old convent, where they discover that the case is anything but over.

name: Deadwind
overview: When Sofia Karppi, a detective in her 30's who is trying to get over her husband's death, discovers the body of a young woman on a construction site, she triggers a chain of events that threatens to destroy her life again.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Just months after a tragic loss, detective Sofia Karppi investigates the murder of a woman with ties to a Helsinki construction company.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Corruption and murder collide as Helsinki detectives Sofia Karppi and Sakari Nurmi scour the city for the rumored connection.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: After Karppi and Nurmi reconcile, the pair dives into a case involving a mysterious symbol, pharmaceutical promises and a deeply disturbed murderer.

episodes.name: The Widow
episodes.overview: After a woman's body is found buried at a construction site, detective Sofia Karppi and her new partner home in on the victim's disgruntled ex-client.

episodes.name: The Party
episodes.overview: Surveillance footage showing Anna leaving the Tempo party leads Karppi and Nurmi to the home of entrepreneur and real estate investor Stig Olander.

episodes.name: Do-Gooder
episodes.overview: Karppi and Nurmi look into the Lexus's connection to Anna. Alex Hoikkala receives a startling ultimatum. Usko takes offense to a police theory.

episodes.name: The Kidnapping
episodes.overview: A co-worker reveals a clue to Anna's future plans. Linda finds herself in harm's way. When Karppi is sidelined, Nurmi gets a chance to show his mettle.

episodes.name: The Brother
episodes.overview: Karppi's initiative rubs some the wrong way. Alex makes an admission to Linda. A card found in the Lexus reveals who was driving it after the party.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Karppi searches for Roope Hoikkala and Henna, who've disappeared for very different reasons. Usko and his daughters face a difficult day.

episodes.name: Roots
episodes.overview: Karppi and Nurmi travel to Anna's hometown after learning she visited her estranged parents right before her murder. Alex's business suffers a setback.

episodes.name: Therapy
episodes.overview: A new autopsy changes the timeline of the murder. Nurmi gets an unexpected therapy session. Usko goes shopping on the black market.

episodes.name: Good Samaritans
episodes.overview: A former suspect offers up surprising information about Anna's years on the swim team. Alex tries to confirm who was behind the new test results.

episodes.name: Alone
episodes.overview: Usko seeks revenge, shifting the police's focus onto him. After a night of drowning their sorrows, Karppi and Nurmi look at the case's big picture.

episodes.name: Bruises
episodes.overview: Searching for evidence underwater, Nurmi gets unexpected company. Karppi figures out what the white capsules in the diving video are and lays a trap.

episodes.name: The Beginning
episodes.overview: Following a shocking confrontation atop a building, Karppi and Nurmi realize that Anna Bergdahl's murderer may be someone they've not yet considered.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Just months after a tragic loss, detective Sofia Karppi investigates the murder of a woman with ties to a Helsinki construction company.

episodes.name: Whisper of the Stars
episodes.overview: Detectives Sofia Karppi and Sakari Nurmi investigate two murders and their possible connection to an enormous construction project.

episodes.name: The Meelika
episodes.overview: As Karppi grieves a painful loss, she and Nurmi search for the meaning behind a cryptic clue written in blood.

episodes.name: Lady Justice
episodes.overview: Karppi has a contentious conversation about her son. The mayor finds herself in danger, both politically and personally.

episodes.name: Trade-off
episodes.overview: The police go on a frantic hunt for Iida while Henna struggles with a dangerous situation. A profile of the kidnapper comes into focus.

episodes.name: Paldiski
episodes.overview: Karppi and Nurmi dig for answers in hopes the mayor is still alive. Henna's quest to wipe away a debt takes an alarming turn.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: Henna makes a desperate call, Nurmi has a painful reunion with an ex-flame and Karppi comes face-to-face with an unwelcome visitor.

episodes.name: Mayday
episodes.overview: Karppi suspects there may be a deeper layer to the case, but not everyone agrees. Meanwhile, Henna makes a startling confession.

episodes.name: Black Water
episodes.overview: As Karppi and Nurmi put the final pieces together, they learn — perhaps too late — that the target of their pursuit won't go quietly.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Corruption and murder collide as Helsinki detectives Sofia Karppi and Sakari Nurmi scour the city for the rumored connection.

episodes.name: The Cage
episodes.overview: When a woman is found in a cage brutally murdered, Karppi and Nurmi focus on learning everything they can about the victim — and her troubled son.

episodes.name: Back Room
episodes.overview: Fueled by desperation, Ossi makes a move. Karppi receives an intriguing call about her late husband. Nurmi has a brief — but painful — reunion.

episodes.name: The Container
episodes.overview: Karppi's case takes a turn when human remains are found in the sewer. Nurmi visits Laura in the hospital. Henna faces heat from all sides.

episodes.name: Kos
episodes.overview: While searching for a missing suspect, Karppi and Nurmi make another grisly discovery. A cryptic clue hints at the killer's motive.

episodes.name: Kansas
episodes.overview: Karppi and Nurmi investigate if a teen's overdose is connected to their case. Henna goes snooping. Karppi chases a lead in her husband's death.

episodes.name: The Road
episodes.overview: Now on the run from the police, Karppi fights to continue her investigation. A terrified Henna finds herself in mortal danger.

episodes.name: Thumb Drive
episodes.overview: An unexpected encounter leads to more clues about Karppi's husband. The detectives unravel a common thread among the victims.

episodes.name: The Ruins
episodes.overview: Karppi and Nurmi track the suspect to the ruins of an old convent, where they discover that the case is anything but over.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: After Karppi and Nurmi reconcile, the pair dives into a case involving a mysterious symbol, pharmaceutical promises and a deeply disturbed murderer.
